response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe is worth more than $10,000 to you based on its unique features and benefits. Considering its value and the fact that it is tailored to meet your specific needs, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer is designed to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring you have access to a high-quality solution that will significantly enhance your experience. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
